Title: Steve Guttenberg's Birthday
Plot: At his own birthday, Steve Guttenberg volunteers to turn his party into a writing workshop when he overhears Roman and writing partner Kent discussing their script.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Offensive language,drug use and sexual content that may offend
GuestStars: Steve Guttenberg, Christopher Mintz-Plasse, Lupe Ontiveros, Sarah Habel, Brad William Henke
